title: Custom README Generator
description: A command-line application that dynamically generates a professional README.md file based on user input.

title: InfoTravel
description: A single page application that would allow a user to plan a trip to a city while giving them all of the information they might require to assist them in their planning

title: WeatherNow or Later
description: A single web page application that allows users to see the weather forecast for any city.

title: Daily Planner
description: A simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day.

title: Code Quiz
description: A timed coding quiz with multiple-choice questions that run in the browser.

title: Console Finance
description: A single page web application that analyses the financial records of a company.
